About

We are a doing our best.

Empowering Creators with Numbers.

We're creators just like you, with a love of webtoons, that also all have degrees relating to mathematics. We believe in giving creators the tools to kick ass across the internet and with most of our friends being webtoon creators this was our first port of call.
